name: Charlie's Dungeons Crawl
description:
Charlie's Dungeon Crawl is a 2D platformer based upon my cat, Charlie! In it, you explore dungeons, fighting skeletons and exploring to gain powerups and find the treasure.

Credits

A lot of the actual programming for this game was assigned and given by Michigan State University's CAS117 class, though some of it was done by myself, like the dynamic lighting. All the music, art, and visual assets are my own.
